list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: You seems worried about something...
_list_topic_data: I can smell a dirty wolf's stink in this city... My senses do not fool me. There is daedric influence nearby.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: What are you talking about? I can't understand...
_list_topic_data: I can sense the presence of evil daedra here in this city. Go to Gallows Rock, if you want to know the truth.
Stop right there. What do you want?

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: I'm just passing by...
Who are you?
_list_topic_data: We are the Silver Hand. We are werewolf hunters.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: Can I join the Silver Hand?
_list_topic_data: That is not a simple question. As I said, our group hunts and is persecuted by powerful enemies.
First we have to know if you are trustful and worth joining us. Therefore, you must complete an initiation task.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: You seems to be outcast...
_list_topic_data: That's because we have powerful enemies out there...

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: I want to join the Companions!
_list_topic_data: So get you of here before I kill you.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: I want to become a Werewolf.
_list_topic_data: So get you of here before I kill you.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: You group seems to be just smugglers thieves!
_list_topic_data: So get you of here before I kill you.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: What should I do to join?
_list_topic_data: Go to Cold Rock Pass and kill the Frost Troll that is living there, the bigger one, and come back with a proof of your hunt. Than we may talk again.
If  you are unable to kill that frost troll, you will be unable to kill werewolves anyway.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: What enemies?
I don't want to get involved on this...
_list_topic_data: Good look out there. May the divines and Ysgramor guide your path.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: So, goodbye. I must be going.
_list_topic_data: Good look out there. May the divines and Ysgramor guide your path.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: I killed the Toll in Cold Rock Pass. Here is its Skull.
_list_topic_data: I know you would be able to do it. Go talk to "Krev the Skinner", our leader. He is inside, on the main Hall. Go talk to him. Good Luck!

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: Are you Krev the Skinner? I'm here because I want to join the Silver Hand.
_list_topic_data: Yes I'm! Welcome! You did well against the frost troll on the Cold Rock Pass. Congratulations! You proceed well on our initiation.
But, before we proceed, I have a question. Why do you want to join the Silver Hands?

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: I want to hunt Werewolves.
_list_topic_data: An adventure seeker eh? We need more people like you here.
But I have more things to say before you can join us.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: I want to fight against the influence of Daedra in Skyrim.
_list_topic_data: This is an honor cause that every sons and daughters of Skyrim who wish to go Sovngarde one day, must fight for.
But I have more things to say before you can join us.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: What things?
_list_topic_data: We fight against these beasts to cleanse this foul daedric disease that has taken the sanity of many of our brothers and sisters here on Skyrim.
But worst than that, have corrupted the souls of many sons of Skyrim, and take them away from Sovngarde in exchange of an ephemeral power in life.
But, you must be aware. No only beggars and forgotten people have lycanthropy here on Skyrim.
Many influential and powerful  people have this curse... or "gift" as many of them say.
If you become a Silver Hand, you will have to fight not only physically, but also politically and economically powerful people.
After all I said, do you still want to become a Silver Hand?

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: Yes, I do!
_list_topic_data: Now, you are officially a silver hand initiate. Take this armor and shield.
They are not expensive ones, but are especially good to protect against the cold weather of the ice fields.
Take this weapon, it is a Silver sword. It will protect you against foul creatures we fight against.
I will give you one book too, it is called Songs of Return, volume seven.
Read it, you will learn more about the Ysgramor and its legacy.
Each Silver Hand must read one of this.
Downstairs, there is a library, where you will find other useful book, if you are interested to learn more.
Stop right there. What do you want?

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: I'm just passing by...
Wait...Who are you?
_list_topic_data: I'm a Silver Hand. We are werewolf hunters.

list_topic_dialogs.player_dialog: Can I join the Silver Hand?
_list_topic_data: It is not an easy task. But if you want to know if you are worth, go to Gallows Rock.
